statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m' "$(basename "$cwd")"; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf ' \033[90m%s\033[0m' "$branch"; fi; mode=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); if [ -n "$mode" ] && [ "$mode" != "null" ]; then printf ' \033[90m[%s]\033[0m' "$mode"; fi; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf ' \033[90m%d%%\033[0m' "$pct"; fi
